hypothesis_content.title: Memecoin Volatility Compression Breakout Pattern
hypothesis_content.statement: When top 10 memecoins (by market cap) experience 3 consecutive days of declining volatility (ATR(14) dropping >20% total) during NEUTRAL regime, a volatility expansion event occurs within 48h where the highest-volume memecoin outperforms BTC by >12% over 24h.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Memecoin traders exhibit 'boredom breaks' during low volatility periods. Compression in ATR with sustained volume indicates pent-up speculative energy. The highest-volume token typically leads the breakout as liquidity attracts momentum.
entry_conditions: Memecoin volatility index (avg ATR(14) of top 10) declines >20% over 3 days
Memecoin aggregate volume remains >$2B daily (sustained interest)

exit_conditions.stop_loss: Break below 3-day low on highest-volume memecoin

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: Volatility continues to decline for 2+ additional days without expansion event (>15% move in any memecoin).
